alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Cumberland; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Sampson; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 6:05PM EDT until July 01 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sampson County in central North Carolina... Harnett County in central North Carolina... North central Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... Southern Wake County in central North Carolina... Johnston County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 604 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cary to near Fuquay-Varina to 9 miles east of Sanford, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Sanford, Smithfield, Lillington, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Dunn and Angier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Cumberland; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Sampson; Wake
